name: Dino Rush
description: Welcome to Dino Rush – the ultimate test of survival in a prehistoric world! Dodge, weave, and sprint your way through a relentless horde of dinosaurs as you strive to survive for as long as possible. Encounter a variety of dinosaurs, each with their own unique behaviors and challenges. Collect power-ups, navigate obstacles, and push your reflexes to the limit in this pulse-pounding action experience! Are you ready to outmaneuver the dinosaurs and claim the title of ultimate survivor? Join the rush now!
